|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Marvell]] 88E6218 ARM946E-S @150MHz *Co-processor: [[Freescale]] [https://www.nxp.com/docs/en/data-sheet/MC9S08GB60.pdf MC9S08GT32] to manage PoE *Flash/RAM: 8MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 32MB RAM *LAN: 8x Fast Ethernet (RJ45) 802.3af PoE Ethernet ports, :2x GbE SFP/RJ45 Shared slots, *PoE: 802.3af (PoE), 60W PoE budget
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Edgewater 800PoE Internal.jpeg|Internal view File:Edgewater 800PoE Main Top.jpeg|Main board top File:Edgewater 800PoE Main Bottom.jpeg|Main board bottom File:Edgewater 800PoE PoE Board.jpeg|PoE board </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
